content: रोह {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रुह्-अच्] {@--1@} Growing, springing up. {@--2@} Rising, ascending. {@--3@} Riding on; as in अश्वरोहः ‘a rider.’. --हः {@--1@} Rising, height, attitude. {@--2@} The raising of anything (as of a number from a smaller to a higher denomination). {@--3@} Growth, development (<ab>fig.</ab>). {@--4@} Bud, blossom, shoot.
